```{r setup, include = FALSE}
require(netmeta)
require(data.table)

require(ggplot2)

```

```{r function_3groups}
foo3 <- function(ep) {
  tmp <- dt1[, c("Study",
                 "Arm",
                 "N",
                 ep),
             with = FALSE]
  names(tmp)[4] <- "Events"
  tmp <- tmp[!is.na(Events),]
  tmp$Arm <- factor(tmp$Arm,
                    levels = c("DAPT",
                               "ASA only",
                               "P2Y12 only"))
  
  tmp1 <- tmp[Arm != "DAPT",]
  
  tmp2 <- tmp[Arm == "DAPT",
              c("Study",
                "N",
                "Events")] 
  
  tmp3 <- merge(tmp1,
                tmp2,
                by = "Study")
  
  # Add half to all counts to avoid Infs
  tmp3.1 <- copy(tmp3)
  tmp3.1$N.x <- tmp3.1$N.x + 0.5
  tmp3.1$Events.x <- tmp3.1$Events.x + 0.5
  tmp3.1$N.y <- tmp3.1$N.y + 0.5
  tmp3.1$Events.y <- tmp3.1$Events.y + 0.5
  
  tmp3.1[, OR := (Events.x/N.x)/(Events.y/N.y)]
  tmp3.1[, logOR := log(OR)]
  tmp3.1[, seLogOR := sqrt((1/Events.x) + 
                             (1/N.x) +
                             (1/Events.y) + 
                             (1/N.y))]
  tmp3.1$Compare <- "DAPT"
  tmp3.1 <- tmp3.1[, c(1:2, 10, 3:9)]
  print(datatable(tmp3.1,
                  caption = "",
                  rownames = FALSE,
                  class = "cell-border stripe",
                  options = list(searching = TRUE,
                                 pageLength = nrow(dt1))) %>%
          formatCurrency(columns = 4:7, 
                         currency = "",
                         digits = 1,
                         mark = ",") %>%
          formatCurrency(columns = 8:10, 
                         currency = "",
                         digits = 3,
                         mark = ","))
  
  # # Exclude infinities
  # tmp3 <- tmp3[is.finite(logOR), ]
  
  m1 <- netmeta(TE = logOR,
                seTE = seLogOR,
                n1 = N.x,
                n2 = N.y,
                event1 = Events.x,
                event2 = Events.y,
                treat1 = Arm,
                treat2 = Compare,
                studlab = Study,
                reference.group = "DAPT",
                seq = c("ASA only",
                        "P2Y12 only",
                        "DAPT"),
                comb.random = TRUE,
                comb.fixed = FALSE,
                all.treatments = TRUE,
                sm = "OR",
                data = tmp3.1)
  
  netgraph(m1,
           cex.number.of.studies = TRUE)
  
  print(m1,
        reference.group = "DAPT")
  # print(m1,
  #       reference.group = "ASA only")
  
  forest(m1, 
         reference.group = "DAPT",
         col.square = "blue",
         sortvar = c("P2Y12 only",
                     "ASA only",
                     "DAPT"),
         smlab = "")
  
  t1 <- melt(m1$TE.random)
  names(t1) <- c("Treatment1",
                 "Treatment2",
                 "OR")
  t1$LB <- melt(m1$lower.random)$value
  t1$UB <- melt(m1$upper.random)$value
  t1$pval <- melt(m1$pval.random)$value
  t1 <- data.table(Endpoint = ep,
                   t1)
  t1 <- t1[t1$OR != 0, ]
  t1$OR <- exp(t1$OR)
  t1$LB <- exp(t1$LB)
  t1$UB <- exp(t1$UB)
  
  print(datatable(t1,
                  caption = "",
                  rownames = FALSE,
                  class = "cell-border stripe",
                  options = list(searching = TRUE,
                                 pageLength = nrow(t1))) %>%
          formatCurrency(columns = 4:7, 
                         currency = "",
                         digits = 3))
  
  t2 <- data.table(Endpoint = ep,
                   Study = m1$studlab,
                   Treatment1 = m1$treat1,
                   Treatment2 = m1$treat2,
                   OR = exp(m1$TE.nma.random),
                   LB = exp(m1$lower.nma.random),
                   UB = exp(m1$upper.nma.random),
                   pVal = m1$pval.nma.random)
  t2.1 <- data.table(Endpoint = ep,
                     Study = t2$Study,
                     Treatment1 = t2$Treatment2,
                     Treatment2 = t2$Treatment1,
                     OR = 1/t2$OR,
                     LB = 1/t2$UB,
                     UB = 1/t2$LB,
                     pVal = t2$pVal)
  t2 <- rbindlist(list(t2,
                       t2.1))
  setorder(t2,
           Treatment2)
  
  print(datatable(t2,
                  caption = "",
                  rownames = FALSE,
                  class = "cell-border stripe",
                  options = list(searching = TRUE,
                                 pageLength = nrow(t2))) %>%
          formatCurrency(columns = 5:8, 
                         currency = "",
                         digits = 3))
  
  t3 <- data.table(Endpoint = ep,
                   Study = tmp3.1$Study,
                   Treatment1 = tmp3.1$Arm,
                   Treatment2 = tmp3.1$Compare,
                   N = tmp3$N.x + tmp3$N.y, # NOTE: this are numbers before adding 0.5
                   OR = tmp3.1$OR,
                   LB = exp(tmp3.1$logOR - 1.96*tmp3.1$seLogOR),
                   UB = exp(tmp3.1$logOR + 1.96*tmp3.1$seLogOR))
  
  tmp <- t1[(Treatment1 %in% c("ASA only",
                               "P2Y12 only") & 
               Treatment2 == "DAPT"), ]
  t3 <- rbindlist(list(t3,
                       data.table(Endpoint = ep,
                                  Study = rep("Average", nrow(tmp)),
                                  Treatment1 = tmp$Treatment1,
                                  Treatment2 = tmp$Treatment2,
                                  N = NA,
                                  OR = tmp$OR,
                                  LB = tmp$LB,
                                  UB = tmp$UB)))
  setorder(t3,
           Treatment1)
  print(datatable(t3,
                  caption = "",
                  rownames = FALSE,
                  class = "cell-border stripe",
                  options = list(searching = TRUE,
                                 pageLength = nrow(t3))) %>%
          formatCurrency(columns = 6:8, 
                         currency = "",
                         digits = 3))
  
  t3$Comparison <- paste(t3$Treatment1,
                         "vs.",
                         t3$Treatment2)
  
  p1 <- ggplot(t3,
               aes(x = Study,
                   y = OR,
                   ymin = LB,
                   ymax = UB,
                   fill = Comparison)) +
    facet_wrap(~ Comparison) +
    coord_flip() +
    geom_errorbar(width = 0.3) +
    geom_hline(yintercept = 1,
               linetype = 2) +
    geom_point(size = 3,
               shape = 23) +
    scale_y_continuous(trans = log_trans(),
                       breaks = c(0.1, 0.2, 0.5, 2^(0:5))) +
    theme(legend.position = "none")
  
  print(p1)
}
```

```{r function_4groups}
foo4 <- function(ep) {
  tmp <- dt1[, c("Study",
                 "Arm2",
                 "N",
                 ep),
             with = FALSE]
  names(tmp)[4] <- "Events"
  tmp <- tmp[!is.na(Events),]
  tmp$Arm2 <- factor(tmp$Arm2,
                     levels = c("DAPT",
                                "ASA only 3m",
                                "ASA only 6m",
                                "P2Y12 only"))
  
  tmp1 <- tmp[Arm2 != "DAPT",]
  
  tmp2 <- tmp[Arm2 == "DAPT",
              c("Study",
                "N",
                "Events")] 
  
  tmp3 <- merge(tmp1,
                tmp2,
                by = "Study")
  
  # Add half to all counts to avoid Infs
  tmp3.1 <- copy(tmp3)
  tmp3.1$N.x <- tmp3.1$N.x + 0.5
  tmp3.1$Events.x <- tmp3.1$Events.x + 0.5
  tmp3.1$N.y <- tmp3.1$N.y + 0.5
  tmp3.1$Events.y <- tmp3.1$Events.y + 0.5
  
  tmp3.1[, OR := (Events.x/N.x)/(Events.y/N.y)]
  tmp3.1[, logOR := log(OR)]
  tmp3.1[, seLogOR := sqrt((1/Events.x) + 
                             (1/N.x) +
                             (1/Events.y) + 
                             (1/N.y))]
  tmp3.1$Compare <- "DAPT"
  tmp3.1 <- tmp3.1[, c(1:2, 10, 3:9)]
  print(datatable(tmp3.1,
                  caption = "",
                  rownames = FALSE,
                  class = "cell-border stripe",
                  options = list(searching = TRUE,
                                 pageLength = nrow(dt1))) %>%
          formatCurrency(columns = 4:7, 
                         currency = "",
                         digits = 1,
                         mark = ",") %>%
          formatCurrency(columns = 8:10, 
                         currency = "",
                         digits = 3,
                         mark = ","))
  
  # # Exclude infinities
  # tmp3 <- tmp3[is.finite(logOR), ]
  
  m1 <- netmeta(TE = logOR,
                seTE = seLogOR,
                n1 = N.x,
                n2 = N.y,
                event1 = Events.x,
                event2 = Events.y,
                treat1 = Arm2,
                treat2 = Compare,
                studlab = Study,
                reference.group = "DAPT",
                seq = c("ASA only 3m",
                        "ASA only 6m",
                        "P2Y12 only",
                        "DAPT"),
                comb.random = TRUE,
                comb.fixed = FALSE,
                all.treatments = TRUE,
                sm = "OR",
                data = tmp3.1)
  
  netgraph(m1,
           cex.number.of.studies = TRUE)
  
  print(m1,
        reference.group = "DAPT")
  # print(m1,
  #       reference.group = "ASA only 3m")
  
  forest(m1, 
         reference.group = "DAPT",
         col.square = "blue",
         sortvar = c("P2Y12 only",
                     "ASA only 3m",
                     "ASA only 6m",
                     "DAPT"),
         smlab = "")
  
  t1 <- melt(m1$TE.random)
  names(t1) <- c("Treatment1",
                 "Treatment2",
                 "OR")
  t1$LB <- melt(m1$lower.random)$value
  t1$UB <- melt(m1$upper.random)$value
  t1$pval <- melt(m1$pval.random)$value
  t1 <- data.table(Endpoint = ep,
                   t1)
  t1 <- t1[t1$OR != 0, ]
  t1$OR <- exp(t1$OR)
  t1$LB <- exp(t1$LB)
  t1$UB <- exp(t1$UB)
  
  print(datatable(t1,
                  caption = "",
                  rownames = FALSE,
                  class = "cell-border stripe",
                  options = list(searching = TRUE,
                                 pageLength = nrow(t1))) %>%
          formatCurrency(columns = 4:7, 
                         currency = "",
                         digits = 3))
  
  t2 <- data.table(Endpoint = ep,
                   Study = m1$studlab,
                   Treatment1 = m1$treat1,
                   Treatment2 = m1$treat2,
                   OR = exp(m1$TE.nma.random),
                   LB = exp(m1$lower.nma.random),
                   UB = exp(m1$upper.nma.random),
                   pVal = m1$pval.nma.random)
  t2.1 <- data.table(Endpoint = ep,
                     Study = t2$Study,
                     Treatment1 = t2$Treatment2,
                     Treatment2 = t2$Treatment1,
                     OR = 1/t2$OR,
                     LB = 1/t2$UB,
                     UB = 1/t2$LB,
                     pVal = t2$pVal)
  t2 <- rbindlist(list(t2,
                       t2.1))
  setorder(t2,
           Treatment2)
  
  print(datatable(t2,
                  caption = "",
                  rownames = FALSE,
                  class = "cell-border stripe",
                  options = list(searching = TRUE,
                                 pageLength = nrow(t2))) %>%
          formatCurrency(columns = 5:8, 
                         currency = "",
                         digits = 3))
  
  t3 <- data.table(Endpoint = ep,
                   Study = tmp3.1$Study,
                   Treatment1 = tmp3.1$Arm2,
                   Treatment2 = tmp3.1$Compare,
                   N = tmp3$N.x + tmp3$N.y, # NOTE: this are numbers before adding 0.5
                   OR = tmp3.1$OR,
                   LB = exp(tmp3.1$logOR - 1.96*tmp3.1$seLogOR),
                   UB = exp(tmp3.1$logOR + 1.96*tmp3.1$seLogOR))
  
  tmp <- t1[(Treatment1 %in% c("ASA only 3m",
                               "ASA only 6m",
                               "P2Y12 only") & 
               Treatment2 == "DAPT"), ]
  t3 <- rbindlist(list(t3,
                       data.table(Endpoint = ep,
                                  Study = rep("Average", nrow(tmp)),
                                  Treatment1 = tmp$Treatment1,
                                  Treatment2 = tmp$Treatment2,
                                  N = NA,
                                  OR = tmp$OR,
                                  LB = tmp$LB,
                                  UB = tmp$UB)))
  
  setorder(t3,
           Treatment1)
  print(datatable(t3,
                  caption = "",
                  rownames = FALSE,
                  class = "cell-border stripe",
                  options = list(searching = TRUE,
                                 pageLength = nrow(t3))) %>%
          formatCurrency(columns = 6:8, 
                         currency = "",
                         digits = 3))
  
  t3$Comparison <- paste(t3$Treatment1,
                         "vs.",
                         t3$Treatment2)
  
  p1 <- ggplot(t3,
               aes(x = Study,
                   y = OR,
                   ymin = LB,
                   ymax = UB,
                   fill = Comparison)) +
    facet_wrap(~ Comparison) +
    coord_flip() +
    geom_errorbar(width = 0.3) +
    geom_hline(yintercept = 1,
               linetype = 2) +
    geom_point(size = 3,
               shape = 23) +
    scale_y_continuous(trans = log_trans(),
                       breaks = c(0.1, 0.2, 0.5, 2^(0:5))) +
    theme(legend.position = "none")
  
  print(p1)
}
```

# Net Effect: MI - Major Bleeding
```{r net_effect_mi_mbleed, fig.width = 7, fig.height = 5}
dt1$net_mi_majbleed <- dt1$MI - dt1$`Major Bleeding`

p1 <- ggplot(dt1,
             aes(x = net_mi_majbleed,
                 y = Study,
                 fill = Study,
                 size = log(N))) +
  facet_wrap(~ Arm) +
  geom_point(shape = 21) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0,
             linetype = "dashed") +
  scale_x_continuous("Net Effect: MI - Major Bleeding") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
print(p1)

p2 <- ggplot(dt1,
             aes(x = 100*net_mi_majbleed/N,
                 y = Study,
                 fill = Study,
                 size = log(N))) +
  facet_wrap(~ Arm) +
  geom_point(shape = 21) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0,
             linetype = "dashed") +
  scale_x_continuous("Net Effect: %MI - %Major Bleeding") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
print(p2)

dt1[, wgt := N/sum(N),
    by = "Arm"]

dt1[, mu := mean(net_mi_majbleed,
                 na.rm = TRUE),
    by = "Arm"]
dt1[, wgt.mu := sum(wgt*net_mi_majbleed,
                     na.rm = TRUE),
    by = "Arm"]

dt1[, mu.pct := mean(100*net_mi_majbleed/N,
                     na.rm = TRUE),
    by = "Arm"]
dt1[, wgt.mu.pct := sum(100*wgt*net_mi_majbleed/N,
                         na.rm = TRUE),
    by = "Arm"]


t1 <- unique(dt1[, c("Arm",
                     "mu",
                     "wgt.mu",
                     "mu.pct",
                     "wgt.mu.pct")])
colnames(t1) <- c("Arm",
                  "Mean Difference",
                  "Mean Weighted Difference",
                  "Mean % Difference",
                  "Mean Weighted % Difference")
datatable(t1) %>%
  formatCurrency(columns = 2:5,
                 currency = "",
                 digits = 3)
```
